Attributes Explanation: TA: Typical Angina, ATA: Atypical Angina, NAP: Non-Anginal Pain, ASY: Asymptomatic
Normal: Normal, ST: having ST-T wave abnormality (T wave inversions and/or ST elevation or depression of > 0.05 mV), LVH: showing probable or definite left ventricular hypertrophy by Estes' criteria

Contexts: the slope of the peak exercise ST segment
Attributes Explanation: Up: upsloping, Flat: flat, Down: downsloping
